name: Nokia Shooter
description:
This is a game made for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam.

The objective is simple: shoot everything that moves and try to stay alive as long you can!
The enemies are constantly spawning near the edges of the map. The more you kill faster they spawn.
Remember to search for the items.

You have 2 weapons:
Gun: moderately fast firing bullets.
Rocket Launcher: fires an explosive projectile that can kill multiple enemies in a single blast, but can also hurt you.

PowerUps:
Heart: heals 50% of your HP
Gun: faster rate of fire
Speed Boots: faster walking

Enemies:
1: melee attack only
2: fires bullets
3: faster melee attacker, with more HP
4: rapid fire bullets, also with more HP

Controls:
Arrow keys: moving (and aiming)
Z: fire your gun
X: fire the rocket launcher

1-0: change window size
P: pause
